Student of Perfection

You studied martial arts at Jalmeray's Houses of Perfection.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Student of Perfection Dedication]{Student of Perfection Dedication} Feat 2

Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.Student of Perfection]{Student of Perfection}
Prerequisites powerful fist or expert in unarmed attacks; member of a House of Perfection
Access You are from Jalmeray.

You have learned the martial arts techniques of your House of Perfection. You become trained in your choice of Acrobatics or Athletics and Warfare Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Ki Strike]{Ki Strike} monk class feat, which grants you the ki strike ki spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point that you can recover using the Refocus activity as a monk does. Your ki spells from Student of Perfection are occult spells.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the student of perfection archetype.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Perfect Strike]{Perfect Strike} Feat 4

Prerequisites Student of Perfection Dedication

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Perfect Strike]{Perfect Strike} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Perfect Ki Adept]{Perfect Ki Adept} Feat 6

Prerequisites Student of Perfection Dedication

You gain the appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Unblinking Flame Revelation]{Unblinking Flame Revelation} for Unblinking Flame, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Unbreaking Wave Advance]{Unbreaking Wave Advance} for Unbreaking Waves, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Unfolding Wind Rush]{Unfolding Wind Rush} for Unfolding Wind, or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Untwisting Iron Buffer]{Untwisting Iron Buffer} for Untwisting Iron. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
